application.doc: Updating the general SCIM configuration settings

param.name: appliance_hostname
param.doc: Host name of the appliance.

method.name: PUT
method.doc: To complete this operation with the RESTful web service, issue an HTTP PUT command on the general SCIM configuration resource URI.

param.doc: Basic Authentication header

param.name: Accept:application/json

param.name: enable_header_authentication
param.doc: Whether or not SCIM header authentication is enabled. This will extract credential information from the request and add the required SCIM headers for authentication.

param.name: enable_authz_filter
param.doc: Whether or not the authorization filter is enabled.

param.name: admin_group
param.doc: The name of the administrator group. Used to determine if the authenticated user is an administrator.

param.name: max_user_responses
param.doc: The maximum number of entries that can be returned from a single call to the /User endpoint. If not defined a default value of 500 will be used.

param.name: subattribute
